cu.explanation_en: Setting GNB_IPV4_ADDRESS_FOR_NG_AMF to an invalid IP address format will cause network interface configuration failure and prevent proper AMF communication.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofUplinkSlots to 20 exceeds the maximum allowed value, causing configuration validation failure and preventing proper TDD slot configuration.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofUplinkSlots 設定為 20 超過最大允許值，會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止正確的 TDD 時隙配置。
